summary: Frontend pages/routes for bike detail, brands index/detail, and a manage-bikes page were added, along with a BikeForm and search UX that surfaces matching brands. Backend Bike type was extended with priceRange/images/details and a migration module was added and wired via a conditional migration clause. However, the diff summary does not provide evidence that the backend exposes the required authenticated bike CRUD methods (create/update/delete + ownership/admin checks) or that the required placeholder image asset was added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Expose authenticated backend methods to create/update bikes (signed-in only) and delete bikes (creator or admin only), plus public read methods for browsing/search/detail pages; keep existing review/compare flows compiling with Bike type changes.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the Bike type extended (priceRange/images/details) but does not show any new or updated bike CRUD/query methods nor the required authorization/ownership checks for delete. The backend/main.mo snippet is truncated before any bike-related methods are shown.
evidence: backend/main.mo (truncated; shows updated Bike type and authorization mixin, but no bike CRUD/read methods in provided excerpt)

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required neutral motorcycle silhouette placeholder image asset: bike-placeholder.dim_1200x800.png.
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend pages reference `/assets/generated/bike-placeholder.dim_1200x800.png`, but the diff summary does not show any added static asset file with that name.
